iti45:2.1: “Patisallanarama, bhikkhave, viharatha patisallanarata, ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyutta, anirakatajjhana, vipassanaya samannagata, bruhetaro sunnagaranam.
iti45:2.2: Patisallanaramanam, bhikkhave, viharatam patisallanaratanam ajjhattam cetosamathamanuyuttanam anirakatajjhananam vipassanaya samannagatanam bruhetanam sunnagaranam dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham—
iti45:2.3: dittheva dhamme anna, sati va upadisese anagamita”ti.
iti45:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
